page.title: 15THE BURRA REGATTA
page.content: THE BURRA REGATTA WAS HELD FOR THE 20th TIME THIS YEAR.THERE WERE ABOUT 30 RACES HELD.THERE WERE A LOT OF CUPS AND SHIELDS TO BE WON.THEY WERE ALL IN HARRIET HALCROW'S PORCH.THEY WERE ALL STANDING IN THE WINDOW.ON THURSDAY 30th MAY THE EELA COMPETITION WAS HELD.IT STARTED AT 6:30pm AND THE WEIGH_IN WAS AT 9:30pm.ON FRIDAY 31st MAY THERE WERE TWO RACES.ONE AT 6:30pm AND THE NEXT AT 8:00pm.SATURDAY 1st JUNE WAS THE MAIN DAY.IT HAD AROUND 20 RACES.AT 2:30pm THERE WERE ROWING RACES FOR JUNIORS.AT 3:00pm THERE WERE SPORTS IN THE FOOTBALL PITCH.ADULTS TOOK PART IN RACES TOO.LATER ON THERE WAS THE GREASY POLE.THAT WAS THE BEST THING.A LOT OF CHILDREN WENT OFF IT.THERE WERE MORE CHILDREN AND LESS ADULTS THAT WENT OFF IT THAN LAST YEAR.
